name: UKCoreITKResponseCode
title: UK Core ITK Response Code
description: A set of codes that define the ITK response returned to a sender.

Business Level Response Value - Processing Error
Message Definition Version Value - Processing Error
Non-Approved file type received as an attachment
Unsupported file type received as an attachment
Patient known here. (e.g. Patient is registered here)
Patient not known here. (aka 'patient record not present in system')
Patient no longer at this clinical setting
